name: Gloomstalker Bear
image_prompt: A giant bear with fur like shadows, glowing purple eyes, in a dark forest.
description: A massive ursine predator that absorbs light. It is a favored target for elite Hawksley hunters due to its cunning.

name: Razor-Tusk Boar
image_prompt: A wild boar with metallic silver tusks, charging through underbrush.
description: A boar whose tusks have calcified into organic steel. Hunting one is the standard rite of passage for Hawksley initiates.

name: Storm-Winged Eagle
image_prompt: A colossal eagle with lightning arcing across its wings, flying in a storm.
description: The apex predator of the high peaks. Its feathers are prized fletching for Hawksley archers, but few survive the climb to its nest.

name: Void Weaver
image_prompt: A dangerous Magical Beast creature known as Void Weaver. A spider-like creature made of purple void energy.
description: A Magical Beast known as Void Weaver that spins webs of pure nothingness.

name: Clockwork Sentinel
image_prompt: A dangerous Construct creature known as Clockwork Sentinel. A brass automaton with ticking gears visible in its chest.
description: A Construct known as Clockwork Sentinel that guards ancient vaults.

name: Blighted Treant
image_prompt: A dangerous Elemental creature known as Blighted Treant. A rotting tree creature oozing black ichor.
description: A Elemental known as Blighted Treant corrupted by foul magic.

name: Glass Serpent
image_prompt: A dangerous Construct creature known as Glass Serpent. A snake made of transparent glass segments.
description: A Construct known as Glass Serpent that refracts light to hide itself.

name: Spore Walker
image_prompt: A dangerous Elemental creature known as Spore Walker. A humanoid figure made of mushrooms and mycelium.
description: A Elemental known as Spore Walker that spreads decay wherever it treads.

name: Mirror Mimic
image_prompt: A dangerous Construct creature known as Mirror Mimic. A shapeless form with a reflective surface.
description: A Construct known as Mirror Mimic that copies the appearance of its foes.

name: Crystal Scorpion
image_prompt: A dangerous Beast creature known as Crystal Scorpion. A giant scorpion with a carapace of jagged crystal.
description: A Beast known as Crystal Scorpion whose sting turns flesh to glass.

name: Void Jellyfish
image_prompt: A dangerous Magical Beast creature known as Void Jellyfish. A floating jellyfish made of dark energy.
description: A Magical Beast known as Void Jellyfish that floats through the air, consuming mana.

name: Rotting Treant
image_prompt: A dangerous Elemental creature known as Rotting Treant. A giant tree collapsing under its own decay.
description: A Elemental known as Rotting Treant that spreads rot to everything it touches.

name: Chaos Elemental
image_prompt: A dangerous Elemental creature known as Chaos Elemental. A shifting mass of colors and shapes.
description: A Elemental known as Chaos Elemental formed from pure entropy.

name: Plague Rat
image_prompt: A dangerous Beast creature known as Plague Rat. A large rat covered in sores and green mists.
description: A Beast known as Plague Rat carrying deadly diseases.

name: Spirit Guardian
image_prompt: A dangerous Construct creature known as Spirit Guardian. A suit of armor animated by a glowing blue soul.
description: A Construct known as Spirit Guardian bound to protect ancient sites.

name: Deep Sea Serpent
image_prompt: A massive sea serpent with bioluminescent scales, swimming in the deep ocean.
description: A Beast known as Deep Sea Serpent that crushes ships with its coils.

name: Abyssal Angler
image_prompt: A terrifying anglerfish with a glowing lure that hypnotizes prey, in the dark abyss.
description: A Beast known as Abyssal Angler that hunts in the crushing depths.

name: Coral Golem
image_prompt: A golem made of colorful living coral and rock, walking on the ocean floor.
description: A Construct known as Coral Golem that regenerates as long as it remains submerged.

name: Cloud Ray
image_prompt: A majestic mantra ray flying through the clouds, trailing mist.
description: A Beast known as Cloud Ray that soars through the upper atmosphere.

name: Star Construct
image_prompt: A construct made of constellation lines and star stuff, geometric and beautiful.
description: A Construct known as Star Construct forged from the light of dying stars.
